title: Play Like a Sponge
overview: Nickelodeon UK & Ireland is inviting viewers to Play Like a SpongeÂ this summer in a brand-new short-form series in which SpongeBob has assembled a team of kids to try a selection of Paralympic sports and meet real life Paralympic legends.Produced in partnership with ParalympicsGB, Play Like a Sponge will inspire kids to find their inner SpongeBob SquarePants as the Nickelodeon icon cheers them on in their quest to learn about and sample new sports with paralympic athletes ahead of the upcoming Paralympic games in Paris this August.
